channel.title: Getting Items to Drop
channel.description:
How can I get items to drop correctly? I have been messing around with the "drop type" integer and still nothing is dropping for me. :[ I have used 1-5 as the drop type integer numbers. (nothing drops at all)
My npcdrops.cfg file. //--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 795 5 6889 1

item.title: Getting Items to Drop
item.dc:creator: @octavius octavius
item.description:
@octavius wrote:

Nothing is loading on the page…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 29, 2008, 06:57:54 PM[/size][hr]Nevermind I was messing around with other files and found out how to do it the hard way… hand coded. :[

Read full topic

item.description:

Use this guide at google. It will walk you through it.

change google to run3s3rv3r ( replace the 3s’ with e )
